metadata.title: CVE-2024-29040 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: After deserializing the quote info it was not checked whetherthe magic number in the attest is equal TPM2_GENERATED_VALUE.So an malicious attacker could generate arbitrary quote datawhich was not detected by Fapi_VerifyQuote.

criterions.comment: tpm2-tss package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
